portfolio.title: React Notes App
portfolio.description: Notes app project made with React.js using function components and hooks (useEffect, useState). The notes are saved in local storage so that the user can access them across multiple browsing sessions. The app includes a light/dark mode and sort by date functionality (oldest to newest and vice-versa). For a better user experience, new and updated notes are bumped to the top or bottom of the list - depending on the sorting option - with a timestamp included. This app implements many features of React development, making extensive use of conditional rendering, spread operators, and array methods such as map(), filter() and find().

portfolio.title: proPhoto
portfolio.description: Full-stack group project consisted in creating a web social media for photographers to sell their pictures online. Users' information and pictures were stored in local and relational database. My main focus was to develop the public and private profile pages using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Features to the profile pages include: update profile picture, upload and edit information of pictures for sale, edit user information and view bookmarked and sold pictures. The project was developed with Git/Github, managed via Trello and Agile Methodology (Scrum Framework).

portfolio.title: Weather Website
portfolio.description: Simple weather app using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The goal of the project was to successfully fetch data in JSON format from a third party API via AJAX request to display the current weather and the forecast for the next four days. The challenge of the project was to integrate an auto-complete feature which displays a list of matching cities and their countries.

portfolio.title: Live Minichat
portfolio.description: Full-stack project of a live chatroom prototypes. AJAX request and SQL queries allows users to refresh the chat screen with new messages, as well as view different amount of past messages stored in the database.

portfolio.title: Articles Blog
portfolio.description: Full-stack project of an Articles Blog prototype that can host comments from readers. The objective of this project was to handle relational database in mySQL and fetch data via SQL queries to retrieve users' information and comments.
